Package repast.simphony.gis.legend

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LayerManager
    This interface is designed to support complex hierarchies as the structure for a set of layers describing a map.
    LegendAction<T extends LegendEntry>
    An action that can be executed on an entry in a legend.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultLayerManager  
    LayerManagerTest  
    LegendCellRenderer
    Renderer for drawing the cells in a Legend tree.
    LegendDefaultCellRenderer
    Renderer for a LegendEntry.
    LegendEntry
    This represents a generic entry in the legend.
    LegendLayerEntry
    Used to keep the information about legend tree root and layer node such as name, expanded icon, collapsed icon, and isSelected when mean isLayerVisible or does user select the checkbox for this layer node
    LegendModel
    This is the data model for a legend representing a gis map.
    LegendRuleEntry
    This legend element represents a rule in a style.
    LegendTreeLayerCellRenderer
    Renderer for rendering root and layer Cell in LegendTree
    LegendTreeRuleCellRenderer
    Rule Cell Renderer, the userObject got from a rule node will generate an icon for being set in the renderer as the rule icon
    MapLegend
    This is a widget that represents the legend of some gis space.
